title: My account name?
body:
Hey, my account name use to be (BLANK) and now its changed to ON1SEJUEWP for some reason, i checked to see if anyone took my old name but it says its still available? Can someone tell me what happened? If someone did take it i was told id be given a name change or i thought i would be to where i was able to pick my new name and not be given some random one.

Thanks in advance <3

replies.body: Hey there, it looks like your previous name was taken by another player due to inactivity.  More info is available in our [summoner name clean up guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-), but I flagged your account for a free rename.  The next time you login, you should be able to change your name!

Please don't show your account name here as some may try to get access to it. 

Also make a Ticket about that. 

Link for that is here: 
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
Click the Submit a Request and choose the options suitable to your issue and they'll get right back to you.

Also, don't bump your ticket unless you have more information to provide as it will put your ticket at the bottom of the list.
